meanings.definition: The act of drawing with a pencil or pen.
meanings.sent1: Her dawing of the flower was so detailed.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy dawing animals in my sketchbook.
meanings.sent3: During art class, his dawing of a tree made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her dawing of the landscape was like a window to another world.
meanings.sent5: The dawing of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like you could step into it.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper.
meanings.sent1: The dawing of the map helped us find our way.
meanings.sent2: She practiced dawing circles until they were perfect.
meanings.sent3: His dawing of a smiley face was simple but effective.
meanings.sent4: The dawing of the house plan was clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The dawing of the family portrait captured each member's personality.

meanings.definition: The action of pulling or dragging something behind.
meanings.sent1: The dawing of the heavy box was tiring.
meanings.sent2: He helped with the dawing of the sled up the hill.
meanings.sent3: The dawing of the wagon filled with hay made him feel strong.
meanings.sent4: The dawing of the boat through the water was smooth and steady.
meanings.sent5: The dawing of the suitcase along the path was a good workout.
